archimate:Requirement.name: BC.1.3.8e: e) ensuring equipment that supports critical business processes or is particularly susceptible to failure can be replaced quickly (e.g. by holding a stock of spares on-site).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
